title: My First Portfolio
shortDescription: My first portfolio site and also one of my earliest React projects. It’s a single-page app inspired by futuristic designs that reflects my early exploration into frontend development.
description: My first developer portfolio and one of my earliest React projects. It's a single-page app (SPA) built with Vite, React 18, and styled using both Tailwind CSS and Material UI. The site features a futuristic aesthetic and was my intro to tools like React Query and other libraries like React Simple Maps. It’s a bit old now, but I still view it as a fun little milestone.
